# References {-}

```{r include=FALSE, tidy=FALSE, warning = FALSE}
# list cited packages
pkgs <- c(
  .packages(),
  'bookdown',
  'conflicted',
  'devtools',
  'renv',
  'rmarkdown',
  'roxygen2',
  'tarchetypes',
  'targets',
  'testthat',
  'trackdown',
  'workflowr'
)

# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(pkgs, file = "assets/bib/packages.bib")


```
